game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Major Class - interact with the different parts of the programm
    Author:
    Tarik
    See Also:
    Character, Dice, BoardGame, Navigation, Scanner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      Constructor Initialize character, navigation, dice & scanner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Boolean changeYourWeapon()
      When player loot 2 weapon with the same force, he can choice one of the two
      void currentCell(int diceResult) 
      void initializeFirstCellAndBoardGame()
      This method : Set the character position the first cell Character.setCharacterPosition(int) Retrieve the object BoardGame BoardGame.getBoardGame() Call the cellContent method with the level desired (Easy, Medium, Hard) to populate the Cell ArrayList with Enemies and Stuffs BoardGame.cellContent(String) Finally, the boardGame is shuffled to get random loots on the map
      void runGame()
      runGame permit : To call the Navigation to Create a character Navigation.startMenu(Character) To interact with the boardGame (initialize total number of Cells and an ArrayList for the cells)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        Constructor Initialize character, navigation, dice & scanner

    • Method Detail

      • runGame

        public void runGame()
        runGame permit : To call the Navigation to Create a character Navigation.startMenu(Character) To interact with the boardGame (initialize total number of Cells and an ArrayList for the cells)
        See Also:
        Set the characterPosition and Level {@link #initializeFirstCellAndBoardGame()} Get value of dice, set newCharacterPosition, start interaction {@link #currentCell(int)} If characterPosition outbound the boardGame, an exception is throwed, At thed end of the game user can restart or leave the game {@link menu.Navigation#leaveOrRestartGame(Character)}

      • initializeFirstCellAndBoardGame

        public void initializeFirstCellAndBoardGame()
        This method : Set the character position the first cell Character.setCharacterPosition(int) Retrieve the object BoardGame BoardGame.getBoardGame() Call the cellContent method with the level desired (Easy, Medium, Hard) to populate the Cell ArrayList with Enemies and Stuffs BoardGame.cellContent(String) Finally, the boardGame is shuffled to get random loots on the map

      • currentCell

        public void currentCell(int diceResult)
        Parameters:
        diceResult - int diceResult is a random number between 1 - 6 currentCell : Add result of the dice to the current characterPosition after eachThrow Character.getCharacterPosition() Character.setCharacterPosition(int) Interact with the content of the cell only if there is a loot or an enemy
        See Also:
        game.boardGame.cell

      • changeYourWeapon

        public java.lang.Boolean changeYourWeapon()
        When player loot 2 weapon with the same force, he can choice one of the two
        Returns:
        Boolean Return the choice of the user
